description.description2: Santa Clara University - Leavey School of Business

activities.title:
Life is about the journey, not just numbers

The best returns aren’t always financial—they’re the memories you make along the way. Whether it’s a…

That’s a wrap on Day 2 and our most impactful Pathway to Silicon Valley program yet! 🎉

Over two transformative days, 17 unstoppable women founders…

Last week I co-hosted a game-changing event with Holly Uber!

The room was filled with powerhouse women.

We unpacked real strategies for leading and…

🍽️ 𝘽𝙚𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙖 𝙜𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙩 𝙝𝙤𝙨𝙩: 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙢𝙤𝙨𝙩 𝙪𝙣𝙙𝙚𝙧𝙧𝙖𝙩𝙚𝙙 𝙣𝙚𝙩𝙬𝙤𝙧𝙠𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙨𝙠𝙞𝙡𝙡 𝙩𝙝𝙚𝙧𝙚 𝙞𝙨.

I'm headed to #London…

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼 𝗜 𝘀𝘂𝗰𝗰𝗲𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝘀 𝗮 𝗖𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗳 𝗼𝗳 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗳𝗳?

I get asked this question a lot.

𝘙𝘦𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘵𝘺:

𝘠𝘰𝘶 𝘥𝘰𝘯’𝘵 𝘩𝘢𝘷𝘦…

Excited to participate in "The Multiplier Effect " with #Howwomenlead hosted by Holly Uber  and Jenny Kay Pollock at the Google Huddle.

Full circle…
Our How Women Lead New York executive board member Kerry-Ann Poyser-Edwards Invited me to an amazing conference and moderated this discussion about…

Mom Guilt, or Should we say Mom Pride?

As moms in tech, we travel, launch, and lead—sometimes missing important moments in our kids’ lives. The mom…
Looking forward to #SAPSapphire in Orlando next week. I’ll be joining Abdi Goodarzi to share how HPE harnessed SAP AI, HPE PCAI and Deloitte’s Zora…

behavioral_insights.engagement_patterns: Marketing Directors in San Francisco are highly engaged with content related to digital marketing strategies, social media advertising, and customer acquisition techniques.
behavioral_insights.technology_adoption_trends: These Marketing Directors are early adopters of marketing automation platforms, CRM systems, and data analytics tools to optimize their campaigns and measure ROI.
behavioral_insights.decision_making_behaviors: Marketing Directors in San Francisco tend to rely on case studies, industry reports, and peer recommendations when making decisions about new marketing technologies or strategies.
behavioral_insights.market_dynamics: In San Francisco, the competitive landscape for marketing services is intense, leading Marketing Directors to constantly seek innovative ways to differentiate their brands and capture market share.

market_data.competitive_analysis: High competition among marketing agencies and tech companies in San Francisco
